titles.title: For the relief of Richard Wayne Tribble and Tammy Tribble.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 7/13/1993--Introduced. Authorizes named individuals to bring claims against the United States for damages arising out of a surgical procedure performed on one such individual at the United States Naval Hospital on Guam in 1989.
